title: Cursive / Script / Classic
content:
Hi guys,

I'm having difficulty finding this one — any help would be appreciated.

Many thanks!

| --- | --- |
| [photo.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414035022/http:/typophile.com/files/photo_36.jpg) | 99.41 KB |
author: paul_w

comments.content: "SNK" looks like **CAC Champagne** by American Greetings Corporation (1996)

The font is called CAC Champagne. It was bundled with Create-a-Card cardmaking software.

Edit: Ya beat me, Fivos. Ah well ... I'll leave it because the poster can see the name of the software in case they want to find a used copy.
